hero.title: Alosit Akipi ka Alongakinei Ngitunga ka Turkana
hero.subtitle: Nyam ngikibot ka akipi ngesi ichepa kang ka ilosunoni ngitunga amu ki alongakinei ka akipi ka alongakinei

about.missionText1: Water Access Turkana kipedunete akiles ka map bo ikibarbar ngikibot ka akipi kere Turkana County, Kenya. Ngitalio ngitoe kilosunori ngitunga anyam ngikibot ka akipi ka alongakinei ngesi ichepa ngataka, kilositie akiro ka akideun bo alongakinei akiles ka erai ngesi kipet moi.
about.missionText2: Ejakino tua ka ngitunga ka akadae amu alongakinei ka tiliom ngesi tobongokini bo nyeni ngesi kipeduni ngimwok hinya ka alosit akipi ka alongakinei.
about.locationDesc: Map ngesi kibuch bo ngikibot kere tobong ngikibot ka akipi kere Turkana
about.communityDesc: Kilosunori ngimwok ngakiteng kitera ngikibot ka akipi ka alongakinei ichepa ka ngikej ngitoe
about.cleanWaterDesc: Alosit akipi ka alongakinei amu amat bo akitum ka lopolopoi

challenges.title: Ngikitabaran Ngesi Ejaki Tua
challenges.scarcityDesc: Turkana County kiton ngikitabaran ngakwap ka toma ka akipi, ka akituk ka akimat ngadakina bo ngikibot ka akipi ngesi idaun ngakwap, kisosit alosit akipi ka lopolopoi moi.
challenges.travelDesc: Ngitunga ngakwap kibucha anyam kilometa kitera amu alosit akipi, tobong akiro bo ngitalio ngesi kipet moi.
challenges.infoDesc: Toma ka tiliom ngesi achamakini ka ngikibot ka akipi kisosit ngitunga anyam ngikibot ka akipi ka alongakinei ngesi ichepa ngataka.

impact.title: Ngikaitare Ngitoe
impact.travelDesc: Kilosunori ngitunga kijaki bore ka agieng ngabaran ka lopolopoi ka anyam ngikibot ka akipi ka alongakinei ngesi ichepa ngataka
impact.empowermentDesc: Kiperisa tiliom ngesi kibuchete ngesi kiperori ngitunga hinya ka akiles ka ichamakini ngesi tobong tiliom
impact.healthDesc: Alosit akipi ka alongakinei moi kilosunori alongakinei ka ekokwa bo adekwan alongakinei

map.title: Eturkan Ka Turkana
map.description: Roran eturkan ka Turkana bo inyam ngikile ka ngikibot ka akipi ngitoe

cta.title: Kiper Inyam Ngikibot Ka Akipi?
cta.description: Roran map ngitoe ngesi kibuch amu inyam ngikibot ka akipi ichepa kangino
cta.button: Roran Map Ka Ngikibot Ka Akipi

contact.title: Kibarbar Lo Tua
contact.subtitle: Kikon ngikitabor atau kibuch kilosunet tua? Ewoto tulosi kang.
contact.formDesc: Loku form ngesi eong lou bo tolosi kang ka akiro ka agieng 24.
contact.name: Ekile
contact.subject: Ngakitabaran
contact.messagePlaceholder: Ituitae tiliom ngakwap ka ngikitabor ngakan...
contact.successDesc: Tolosi kang ka akiro ngesi kibuchikini.
contact.errorDesc: Mam kibucha kiperis kibarbar. Tukitae kidi.

waterSources.title: Ngikibot Ka Akipi Kere Turkana
waterSources.subtitle: Nyam ngikibot ka akipi ka alongakinei ichepa kangino

footer.description: Akiles ka map bo ikibarbar ngikibot ka akipi kere Turkana County amu alongakinei alosit ngitunga ka akipi ka alongakinei.

weather.title: Weather Forecast
weather.description: Current weather conditions in Turkana County
weather.predictionsSubtitle: Understanding seasonal patterns to prepare for droughts and floods
weather.importantNoteDesc: Turkana County experiences extreme weather patterns. Understanding these patterns helps communities prepare for water shortages during dry seasons and potential flooding during rainy seasons.
weather.annualPatternsDesc: Rainfall and temperature trends throughout the year
weather.monthlyRainfallDesc: Average monthly rainfall showing wet and dry seasons

impactCards.waterShortageDesc: Prolonged dry periods lead to severe water scarcity, requiring communities to travel longer distances for water access.
impactCards.foodInsecurityDesc: Drought conditions affect livestock and crops, leading to food shortages and the need for emergency aid.
impactCards.floodRiskDesc: Heavy rains during wet seasons can cause flooding, damaging infrastructure and contaminating water sources.
